hotel_name: μΉ΄μ³‡ λ¶€ν‹°ν¬ μƒν•μ΄ (Cachet Boutique Shanghai)
title: Worst hotel ever in Shanghaiβ€
content:
Basic Equipments such as TV didnβ€™t worked. And also some parts of the electricity doesnβ€™t worked, either. The corridor was so dark. 

And the staff doesnβ€™t seem to be the hotel specialist. They donβ€™t speak english at all, and seems that they donβ€™t know what the hotel service should be. They were all Bar(Lounge) staffs. Overall, I donβ€™t think this hotel was runned by the hotel specialist. 

The only good thing was the location.

hotel_name: μ„ μ›”λ“ νΈν…” μ™•ν‘Έμ§• (Sunworld Hotel Wangfujing)
title: Thanks for everything. β€
content: The location of the hotel is close to the downtown area. The staff are kind. During the trip, due to an error in the app, I was in trroble, stuck and needed the help of locals. When I explained the situation, they were asking some questions and even calling the app company directly. so I was able to overcome the problem. Later, when I asked for their names, I was told β€Wade Sunβ€™ and β€Anneie Jiaβ€™. The unexpected help warmed my heart. If I visit Beijing again, I would like to use this hotel. Thanks again for the help I received!

hotel_name: λ…Έλ³΄ν…” ν”Όμ¤ λ² μ΄μ§• νΈν…” (Novotel Peace Beijing Hotel)
title: The worst experience everβ€
content:
The shower curtain and the bath tub was the nastiest thing I've ever seen in my life. We paid good money for the hotel and had at least little expectations because of the novotel brand and the fact that it was 4star. But the room condition is what I imagine a cheap motel room would be like. I still cringe thinking about the bathroom in our room. Also we stayed for two nights and the cleaning was not done well. The hair on the bathroom was still there from the moment we checked in until we checked out. Gross..

title: Good location and good facilityβ€
content:
Location was very good.
1. Very near from west lake.
2. There are many restaurant and shops nearby.
3. Subway station is also not too far.
4. Many good restaurants are locate in same building.
Hotel staffs are very kind and helpful.
Various kinds of pillow are served, sleeps were very comfortable.
